game.title: The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild

description.summary: An open-world adventure game featuring exploration, puzzle-solving, and combat.
description.detailed: Step into a world of discovery, exploration, and adventure in The Legend of Zelda: Breath of the Wild, a boundary-breaking game in the acclaimed series. Travel across fields, through forests and to mountain peaks as you discover what has become of the ruined kingdom of Hyrule in this stunning open-air adventure.

feature.name: Open World
feature.description: Explore a vast and interconnected world with minimal restrictions.

feature.name: Physics Engine
feature.description: Realistic physics allowing for creative problem solving.

feature.name: Climbing System
feature.description: Climb nearly any surface in the game world.

mechanic.name: Combat
mechanic.description: Real-time combat with various weapons and abilities.

mechanic.name: Exploration
mechanic.description: Open-world exploration with climbing, gliding, and swimming mechanics.

progression.main_quest: Defeat Calamity Ganon and save Hyrule.

side_content.korok_seeds: Hidden collectibles that can be exchanged for inventory slots.

description.summary: An open-world RPG set in a dystopian future city.
description.detailed: Cyberpunk 2077 is an open-world, action-adventure story set in Night City, a megalopolis obsessed with power, glamour and body modification. You play as V, a mercenary outlaw going after a one-of-a-kind implant that is the key to immortality.
